src:
WhatsApp Resmikan Fitur Sidik Jari, Begini Cara Pakainya
01 Nov 2019, 11:01 by Josina - detikInet


WhatsApp (Justin Sullivan/Getty Images)

Jakarta - WhatsApp mengumumkan fitur barunya yang memungkinkan pengguna mengamankan chat-chat-nya dari tangan jail. Fitur tersebut dinamai Fingerprint Lock alias kunci sidik jari, yang kini sudah resmi dirilis untuk perangkat Android.Adapun untuk perangkat iOS sudah mendapatkan fitur keamanan melalui Touch ID dan Face ID pada awal tahun ini."Hari ini kami memperkenalkan autentikasi serupa yang memungkinkan Anda membuka kunci aplikasi dengan sidik jari pada telepon Android yang didukung," demikian keterangan WhatsApp yang diterima detikINET.Hadirnya fitur ini tentu memberikan rasa aman dan privasi bagi penggunanya karena obrolan mereka semakin terjaga tanpa dilihat diam-diam oleh orang lain.Cara pakainya pun mudah, pengguna terlebih dahulu meng-update versi terbaru WhatsApp di Play Store. Setelah itu masuk ke halaman depan WhatsApp, pilih ikon titik tiga di ujung kanan atas.


Fitur WhatsApp kunci sidik jari (Foto: dok. WhatsApp)

Pilih Setelan (Settings) >> menu Akun (Accounts), setelah itu pilih Privasi (Privacy), kemudian aktifkan Kunci Sidik Jari (Fingerprint Lock).Pastikan ponselmu sudah mendukung fitur sidik jari, karena untuk bisa mengaktifkan fitur ini kamu harus melakukan setting di ponsel terlebih dahulu.Sebagai tambahan, ketika kamu sudah mengaktifkan fitur ini, meski WhatsApp dalam keadaan terkunci, pengguna tetap bisa menerima panggilan video atau telepon di aplikasinya.




Simak Video "Duh! WhatsApp Hilang dari Play Store"

[Gambas:Video 20detik]

(jsn/fyk)
text:
WhatsApp Opens Fingerprint Features, Here's How to Use It
Nov 1 2019, 11:01 by Josina - detikInet


WhatsApp (Justin Sullivan / Getty Images)

Jakarta - WhatsApp announced a new feature that allows users to secure their chats from jail hands. This feature is called Fingerprint Lock aka fingerprint lock, which has now been officially released for Android devices. As for iOS devices, it has been getting security features through Touch ID and Face ID earlier this year. "Today we introduce a similar authentication that allows you to unlock applications with fingerprints on Android phones are supported, "said WhatsApp received from detikINET. The presence of this feature certainly provides a sense of security and privacy for users because their chat is more awake without being seen silently by others. first updated the latest version of WhatsApp on Play Store. After that enter the WhatsApp home page, select the dot icon at the top right corner.


WhatsApp fingerprint lock feature (Photo: doc. WhatsApp)

Select Settings >> Account menu (Accounts), then select Privacy, then activate Fingerprint Lock. Make sure your phone supports the fingerprint feature, because to be able to activate this feature you must make settings in mobile first. In addition, when you have activated this feature, even though WhatsApp is locked, the user can still receive video or phone calls in the application.




Check out the video "Duh! WhatsApp Missing from Play Store"

[Gambas: 20sec video]

(jsn / fyk)
